WebLink.description:
If Standardized Event Name is utilized, compares Sponsorship Revenue over 12 Months for This Year, Last Year, and 2 Years Ago.
Otherwise, compares the year to date Sponsorship Revenue based on the number of days out from the event we are.
WebLink.url:
/lightning/r/Report/{!IF(
ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c),
"00O1O0000088cvJUAQ", /* Old Y/Y as of Today Report */
"00OJw00000ADl7FMAT" /* New Cumulative Y/Y Report by Month */
)}/view?fv0={!IF(
ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c),
Events__c.Name,
Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c
)}&fv1={!IF(
ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c),
Events__c.last_years_event__c,
"Events"
)}&fv2={!IF(
ISBLANK(Events__c.Standardized_Event_Name__c),
Events__c.Days_Since_Last_Event__c,
"Pretend Computer Company Inc."
)}
